app.name: UClick
app.short_description: UClick - Click 'A' as fast as possible
app.long_description:
UClick A lib_easy example wii u homebrew written in just 72 easy lines of code as commented as possible :D Don't exitate to ask if you need help in creating you own homebrew of trying to get how this one work ;)
Actual game: press 'A' as fast as possible to get higher scores
